name: Mighty Switch Force! 2
synopsis: It’s a Code Red from the Galactic Fire Brigade! Planet Land is combusting and everything is ablaze! Return to HQ immediately and pick up your Infinity Dousing Apparatus; your Siren Helmet is still authorized and up to code! The mission: to fight the inferno and extricate the reformed Hooligan sisters! Now, suit up and start soaking some scenery! • The sequel to the universally acclaimed Mighty Switch Force, and the newest game in the Mighty series! • Grab your new weapon, a super-powered fire hose, and embark on a treacherous search-and-rescue mission! • Familiar friends and foes return, along with exciting new ones! • 3D puzzles and brain-banding action return!
